Name: Base Station, Empire Transportation Svc Inc., Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Empire Transportation Service Inc. also known as Empire Transportation Svc Inc. and also known as Empire Transportation, Inc. for a license to operate a new base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Empire Transportation Service Inc. also known as Empire Transportation Svc Inc. and also known as Empire Transportation, Inc. for a license to operate a new base station at 2271 East 14th Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#1995
7/14/95
